abstract: China may be moving closer to attempting something many have considered unthinkable: taking a substantial stake in the world’s largest miner, BHP Billiton.
lead_paragraph: China may be moving closer to attempting something many have considered unthinkable: taking a substantial stake in the world’s largest miner, BHP Billiton.

headline.main: Is China Planning to Snap Up a $20 Billion Stake in BHP?
